document.masterDocTitle: A complete checklist with new records and geographical distribution of the rove beetles (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae) of Brazil

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A complete checklist with new records and geographical distribution of the rove beetles (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae) of Brazil

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Brazil , Cuba , Dominican Republic , Grenada , Guadeloupe, Haiti , Jamaica , Puerto Rico , St. Barthelemy , St. Lucia , Tobago , Trinidad , Venezuela .

bibRefCitation.author: Fauvel, A.
bibRefCitation.refString: Fauvel, A. 1865 b. Etudes sur les staphylinides de l'Amerique centrale, principalement du Mexique. Bulletin de la Societe Linneenne de Normandie 9: 8 - 66.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Bolivia , Brazil , Colombia , Suriname , Ecuador , French Guiana, Guyana , Nicaragua , Panama , Paraguay , Peru , Venezuela .
Brazilian Biome. Amazon forest, Atlantic forest.
